review_text: It was very clean, great parking, many restaurants to choose from & nicely price.
Love the place I travel for work and it is the perfect place everything in town in just down the road will definitely stay again
I chose to stay here based on the photos and location. I was in town for an event and was 10 minutes from Garrison Ave., the US Marshall's Museum, restaurants, and historic district.
luis was very nice and responded to all of my messages in a timely manner. airbnb was beautiful.
I love the place I stay here a lot and will continue to stay here anytime I can
The place was extremely clean and we were very comfortable.
thank you again, like always it was a pleasure staying at your place 😊
It was great place clean and neat really close to everything
We live 5hrs away and had an unexpected trip we needed to make to fort smith. Even with the last minute booking the place was just what we needed for our visit and VERY clean when we arrived.
Clean place, good location
2nd stay just as comfortable and lovely as the first time
Peaceful stay real quaint
we always stay with Luis, love it and such a perfect host. thank you for everything
Great place to stay as always!
Absolutely perfect stay. Would definitely stay here again. Host was great and communitive.

We asked to check-in a little early so our toddler could nap- Luis was super friendly and accommodated us with no issue. It was spotless- smelled nice and even has extras that were the perfect touch. Coffee pods, snacks for kids, plenty of dishes! Will definitely stay again!
I would choose any property in fort smith as long as Luis is the host
This is the 2nd time we have stayed at this location. We have stayed in other Luis' properties. They are always nice, clean, and he is very responsive. Apreciate him as a host.
Great place and host!

Great place all around! It is removed far enough from the main Avenue that you have peace, but close enough that access to food, shopping, and entertainment is just around the corner. I had to make a last-minute trip and had something come up. I contacted Luis, and he was extremely helpful and went out of his way to ease my situation. On top of it all, I didn't get in till later the first night and didn't grab food, but Luis saved the day, there were snacks and water. Not the most extravagant meal, but a saving grace nonetheless. Highly recommended if you need to stay in the area.
Nice and clean , very comfortable. Will definitely stay again
I have used Luis Air BnB before, they are always good, clean, and the kids love the free popcorn. Luis is a great host!

Great location! My family and I felt safe in the area with our child. Close of UAFW and downtown. Discrete location, friendly neighbors, and great value. The inside the home was beautiful. Luis is a fantastic communicator and check in/out was a breeze. 10/10, will be booking this AirBNB next time I’m in FS!
It was a great place! Nice and clean, very comfortable, and overall very nice!
Luis is a great host, the duplex was simple and just what we needed

I absolutely loved staying here! Everything that is needed was supplied (except broom and mop and can opener). The apartment feels like home and is furnished beautifully. The fenced in porch was so relaxing. Excellent!

This was our second time staying at Luis’s place. We like the way we felt right at home the first time so we had to stay again. He also has snacks for the kids which is a plus! This time around he had extra toiletries. He really does know how to accommodate his guest.
Good neighborhood, home and host. Will stay again.
my workers have stayed at Luis property and liked how comfortable it it to rest after a long day of work
Everything's very clean and tidy!
Great, clean place
Home was very neatly decorated and had all the amenities we needed for our stay.

All the little touches were there! He didn’t miss a thing! Even provided a few extras - the coffee I requested was there & it was exceptional. There were little extras even for the dogs (I won’t give details, I loved the surprise). Very clean, great appliances.
Bonus, Creekmore Park is practically across the street and it is a MUST. This park was not well advertised and it’s impressive. Better than the one on the river even.
Thanks to Luis our trip to Ft Smith was perfect.
Me and my friend enjoyed the place, was peaceful neighborhood and we felt safe also was exactly the description, absolutely we’ll try to rent it for the next JW convention, very recommended.
Great stay! Will stay again!
Luis was a great host. Would definitely stay again!
About the 4th time staying in Luis’s property and again very clean and comfortable with a host that makes sure everything is top notch.

This place was perfect! Very clean and comfortable, easy to find and very quiet. Easy and uncomplicated check out was a plus! I had a wonderful stay and would positively stay here again when in town for another getaway. Luis was a perfect host and I hope to return for another stay soon.
Great stay
Great house very clean I will stay there again
Perfect place for the price. Luis was great to work with us when our work schedule was changed at the last minute.

This spot was amazing. Luis was kind and quick to answer any and all questions. The home was very clean and comfortable. Located in the center of fort smith so shopping and eating places all within a few minute drive.
Great places.... wonderful host...
Nice clean place to stay. Luis was very quick to respond with any issues.
All of our needs were comfortably met. Highly recommend.

Extremely comfortable place to stay!! Luis is a wonderful host, very accommodating and responsive! Everything was very clean and there were a few snacks set out for us when we got there, which was a super nice touch!
Needed a quick place to stay close to a concert, was convenient and clean!

This place was great. Luis is very nice and responds when you message. Most of all everything is nice and clean. There was no noise at all and there were lots of places I can walk to. I had a very lovely stay. thank you
Very clean place. Host was very responsive. He didn't request any special check out process. Offered to bring anything we needed. Had coffee and snacks available. Thank you for the weekend.
Loved the place and Luis communicated well throughout the stay.
Luis was a great host. We were in town for volleyball tournament. the condo was comfortable, clean, quiet, and fully stocked. Great location to get downtown quick.
Great place.
Great as usual!
A great place to stay - and the history of Fort Chafee!

We loved staying here - very clean and had great amenities. Very roomy for the two of us and our dogs! We enjoyed being near the Chaffee Crossing area for ease of access to great restaurants and public park space.
The space was beautiful. Quiet area and very peaceful. There are some very cute shops and breweries within walking distance! We will definitely be back!

Heidi's place is cute and very clean. Just like what you see in pictures. I am a local and needed a place to stay last minute because of my HVAC system being worked on at my place. This whole process was smooth and she was very responsive. I will most definitely book with her again if I am ever in need. Highly recommend.
We loved staying at Laura's place! A great location - central to everything we wanted without having highway noise pollution. a great value, as well. Laura was very responsive and helpful!

The Cottage was a wonderful stay as the photos and description matched the home. Quiet neighborhood and comfortable bed and clean interior of the home. Location was close to the venue where we were staying and close to a lot of places that was within driving distance. Thank you Emily for being a great host and providing the small essentials needed as time we will forget to pack it.
This place was a great! Me and my friends stayed for just one night, but the house was so cozy and was decorated so cute!
Great place to stay, exactly what we needed.
Comfort beds and very clean beautiful space neighborhood was quite as well

This is a cute cottage in an old peaceful neighborhood. It is beautifully renovated on the inside and squeaky clean. Mattresses were comfortable and the kitchen has everything you need to cook a meal. Water pressure in the shower was amazing and we will definitely be staying here again the next time we need to come to Fort Smith.
Note the neighborhood does look a bit sketch when you roll in but we felt safe overall and the neighborhood was actually pretty quiet. For the price this was a great stay.
The place is really cute, very quiet at night, and had lots of character.

My grandma and I stayed here for a couple days and it was absolutely perfect! It was close to everything. We especially liked the information packet Emily put together for her guests. We tried several restaurants on her recommendation list and they were great (not a single chain). And we went to a few attractions she listed. It was very thought out and greatly appreciated.
Great place to stay for my work trip in the area! Great hosts!

Traveled from California to visit my family in Arkansas for a few days and rented this cute space to stay with my son. Great house and very well located. Communication was great and any issue we had was resolved really quickly. Lovely fenced in yard that was perfect for my son and nephew to play outside and was able to have a small family BBQ. Would definitely recommend this space to anyone looking for a small cozy home to stay at while on vacation!
We loved our stay at the Cottage. It was clean, neat, and affordable - just what we wanted!
We liked the great selection of kids' toys and books, the thoughtfully produced guides to the house and the local attractions and restaurants. If only all Airbnb's were like this!

The house is very welcoming and the guide book is so helpful. That is a genius Idea. The dedication to put something so helpful together for the guests is amazing and the complimentary welcome snack very thoughtful. The neighborshood is very quite, Definitely will be coming back...
Accommodations were just as described. Check in was easy. Would recommend this listing to family and friends!
Great location, very accommodating.

My brother and I stayed for 2 nights. He had an eye doctor appointment. Emily's place was very convenient location for us. Emily was very quick to respond. It was perfect for our visit. I cooked dinner both nights in the cute kitchen.
Comfortable & clean - as advertised. The host was very clear with the instructions. The cottage has everything you need. If we are back in the area, we would stay there again.

Nice little place in Ft. Smith. Close to 540 and downtown so super easy to get around. Can't control the neighbors so don't be put off when you pull in. The house is well decorated and equipped, super clean, safe and truly a little gem.
Great place to stay, clean, and cozy!
Great place to stop along our route. The toys for the kids was definitely a bonus and kept ours entertained! Beds were comfortable & house was clean. Overall, good experience.
Although a short stay, we felt safe and had a good nights sleep. Your home was very nice. Thank you so much.
It was a perfect place for our family of 3 to stay the night. It was near everything in town as well. Very clean and homey.

This home is beautiful. The host was very responsive and paid attention to so many details. From the decore, to the items in the kichen everything was wonderful. The beds were so comfortable. The home was so clean and they went above and beyond by providing snacks and items in case we forgot anything. I enjoyed playing the childrens games they provided with my daughter. I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PLACE.

Perfectly clean home!
Comfy bed & Quiet stay!
Highly recommend!
Had a wonderful stay here! The house is absolutely beautiful, it felt comfortable and cozy inside. Great local restaurants and coffee shops nearby!

Had a great stay at this clean and comfortable two bedroom house. Perfect location for getting to Mercy Hospital, which is what brought us to town. Major road with restaurants and shops is also just around the corner.
Wonderful location! Can’t wait to go back!
Good
I loved the place, the pictures presented when booking is exactly what you get!!!
Super clean house! Looked just like the pictures

We had a great time with Emily! She has been one of the most responsive and kind hosts we've interacted with. Very quick to answer questions. Communication was always clear. the space is really nice, comfy beds, even some game options for the kids! We'll definitely come back and stay at Emily's!
Great house to stay at!
We had an amazing stay! Beautiful home and everything we needed was there. Would love to reserve this home again next year!

The place was great. I’m a Fort Smith, Arkansas native that was home for the Christmas holdiay. Prior to booking, I had asked if I could bring my service animal that would be well monitored, crated, cleaned up after, but most importantly - needed a backyard to accomodate him. Emily responsed yes and I booked immediately. The place was clean, had very nice decor, TVs, & snacks. Emily even followed up to a question while in labor. Great host!
My only note for furture bookers who might be traveling in & arrive early unintentionally - is that the digital pad didn’t recognize my code til after check-in time (post 3p).
Such a cute little home with great personal touches from the owner. Home was clean and free of clutter, it was very relaxing and a great location central to our needs.
This was the perfect option for our trip to Fort Smith. Lots of great local options nearby, plenty of space, and so much cozier than a hotel. Would love to stay again!
Felt like home away from home. Very close to tons of restaurants & stores. Emily was very nice & welcoming!
Great clean place for out quick one night stay as we passed through. The beds were extremely comfortable as well!
Super cozy and warm! Cute interior!
Such a cute and cozy home!! Great location and quiet neighborhood!

Emily’s place was a dream. It was well stocked and had everything our family needed for a few days. We only had one minor issue, but Emily was quick to respond and resolve it. I would absolutely stay here again and plan to the next time I need a place in fort smith.
Such a cozy home tucked into the middle of fort smith. The beds were comfy. The bathroom was clean. And the home was beautiful. Thanks for letting us stay!
Convenient location to a beautiful part of Ft Smith. The cottage is very quiet and comfortable.
Very cute and cozy place. Lots of helpful amenities, great kitchen, easy check in and check out, and a good host!
We really enjoyed our stay. The house was clean, and the beds were quite comfortable!
Amazing place. Super clean and comfortable. Will definitely stay again!
We enjoyed our stay, Emily 's place is very clean and cute.
This was a nice little house.
Great stay in a clean and comfortable place. Emily added many details that made for an enjoyable stay.
Highly recommend I would definitely stay again at your place thanks Emily

Emilys place was super clean and trendy! She had great recommendations for food and things to do. The location is conveniently located to EVERYTHING! Emily was thoughtful for having little extra things for her guests just in case they forgot the essentials. We didn’t use any of it, but thought it was awesome! I would 100% stay here again! You will not be disappointed.
Just what I needed. A quick overnight stay where I could safely store my vehicle (motorcycle). Wish I had a little more time to wander around town and maybe find someplace to go eat.
Emily's place was great. Beds were very comfortable. Kitchen well stocked with what you need.
Super cute, super clean, felt right at home! loved the chill deck out back, bbq pit came in handy, had everything we needed. Would book with Emily in the future
I really enjoyed my stay here the place really felt like home if you are in Ft Smith I would highly recommend staying here
This was a welcoming and peaceful 2-week stay.
We had a wonderful stay! It’s decorated SO cute and the furniture is extremely comfortable. The host even provided some snacks which is always appreciated. Would definitely stay again!
Great little place to stay
Great visit, great house!

The place was recently refurbished/renovated, so everything we needed worked great. Washer and dryer a plus for us travelling with baby and fairly reasonable baby proof, and not a lot of clutter. Wifi for remote work and streaming was satisfactory, having coffee and detergents for use was nice, and also some other things if you forget to bring it. Host was responsive and gave clear directions. No issues here. We would stay again. Great little place and great value. Thanks for hosting us
The place was great! Had everything we could possibly need and was super clean! Emily was a great host!
Thanks for a great stay!

Don’t miss out on a chance to stay at a place that truly feels like home, from the moment you arrive! Helpful hosts, clear instructions and suggestions, communication was awesome and not a single problem during my two night stay. Also, not many check out chores which is always nice when living life on the road to our next temporary destination and made for an easy check out by 11 am. Will stay again! Thanks for having us. Next time, we use the grill!! We even had the chance to take advantage of the deep set tub! Cleanliness was untouchable! We’ll be back! Til next time 💖

We loved staying here! It was the perfect girls weekend spot! Close to lots of things and in a quiet neighborhood! We didn’t have any issues and felt safe the entire weekend. Would definitely stay here again!

Absolutely the best little airbnb. Highly recommend staying here if you are in town. It was decorated very cute. Very, very comfortable bed and just overall a wonderful experience. The host was very kind and helpful.

Emily's place was the perfect location for our trip! It is tastefully decorated, simple, and clean. She responded immediately when I had a question and provided a detailed guide for the home and surrounding area. There was ample parking for our vehicle and motorcycle trailer. It's a gorgeous area to ride! We are already planning a return trip for the fall time and will gladly refer friends to Emily's property! We ate dinner at Bricktown Brewery, Fuji Japanese Steakhouse, and Joe's Grill and Cantina, all of which we recommend.
Beautiful house with a great backyard!
Very respectful and clean place to have fun
We had a wonderful stay in Ft.Smith! The home was beautiful and close to everything!
This house was super cute and clean!!
The house was very nice and clean. Really enjoyed our stay!

This was a really cute little place and a perfect base camp for the 2024 solar eclipse. House is in a nice quiet neighborhood that felt safe and despite being next to the Airport, noise was not a problem. Home came well stocked with everything we needed and more. Beds were comfy and appropriately stocked with blankets and pillows. Kitchen was great and had everything we needed to grill out our first night and make side dishes. Outside space is lovely and was a perfect backdrop for a quieter evening.
Wonderful home in a convenient location! Mariyem was responsive and helpful, and we felt right at home. I hope to stay here again the next time we return to Fort Smith!
This was an excellent place with great amenities. Plenty of kitchen utensils. Nice touch with extra throw blankets.

Was clean inside and out. All the amenities were functional and in working condition. All the household items such as napkins, soap, laundry detergent, coffee etc were provided. This place is well taken care of and Mariyem is a super host for a reason.
Such a smooth stay. Great house, with great amenities. Will stay here again!!
stay was okay accept the fire place inside has something wrong with it we lit it one time and the fumes were so bad we had to pack up in middle of night and leave.
Nice peaceful place enjoyed the hot tub
Nice house. Hot tub was very nice and relaxing

Excellent location and very beautiful property. We are planning to return in June.
Thanks
Beautiful home, Got exactly what I paid for!
This house was pretty and perfect for what I needed it for but the price for the location and cleanliness of home was not okay.
Home was amazing and the backyard was super relaxing
Had a great stay! The house was confortable and well put together. Everything was exceptionally clean and well organized.

A wonderful stay! After 12 hours of driving we were so happy to be greeted by such a lovely home, and to sink into the hot tub. Our dogs were equally happy to get to run around the back yard. Then it was a cozy movie night in the living room with the giant tv. Our stay was short, but very sweet. Would definitely recommend.
We had an amazing stay! Mariyem was helpful to any questions we had. Overall, this stay was nothing short of perfection!
Host was nice and responsive.
Great place. Kids loved the hot tub. Will stay again
The place was amazing and the host was excellent at communicating and providing for our every need it was a very beautiful home.

The home was exactly as listed. Mariyem made the trip very easy with instructions and communication.
Would definitely stay here again,
Property is great very clean and close to everything
Mariyems house was just perfect for my gf and I. It’s absolutely gorgeous we loved the patio and the hot tub. Host is very responsive and helpful. Super friendly! 10/10 WILL stay here again!
nice house. comfortable bed. hot tub and fire pit were awesome. easy to find. close to restaurants and shopping. would stay here again

This place is a little higher than other in the area but well worth the extra 30$ or 40$ !! Everything actually looked like the pics! The fireplace is nice touch! Because of the ice my wife slipped and fell earlier that evening, so the hot tub was a nice for the muscles! It was underneath the stars had a brisk 12°! The bed was small but super comfortable. I slept like a baby don’t even remember waking up! And as for my wife, she was snoring by the end of night! We actually overslept! The living room area is actually My favorite. It was separated, brother, the rest of the house yet connected to the fireplace.!! Everything was brand new top-of-the-line and will be staying back at this house if we’re ever back in Fort Smith! ! I never give five stars either!! I’m pretty up front but this house I really can’t find a complaint on !! This one is perfect!!
I loved my stay here. It was close to everything and in a quiet neighborhood. I would definitely stay here again
The patio area with the hot tub was amazing! Beautiful kitchen and living area. Bedrooms and bathrooms were very basic compared to the rest of the home. Host was quick to respond!

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The home is nicely decorated and comfortable. The kitchen is fully furnished with everything we needed. The huge plus for us was the hot tub which we enjoyed everyday we were there. It was especially nice being out there after the freshly fallen snow. Communication with Mariyem was excellent - immediate and very friendly. Will be looking to stay here again whenever in the area again.

Mariyem and her place was great! Stayed there to celebrate Christmas with family. She was very proactive and communicated well to make sure our needs were met. The kids had plenty of room to play and our dog LOVED the big back yard!
great family experience. highly recommend.
Such a cute house and in a great location! Also loved the back yard and the hot tub! Would definitely stay here again! :)

My experience with this place was very clean, beautiful, and worth every penny. I loved how messaging the host was very quick, easy, and she was really nice. I definitely would recommend and stay again!
We had a great time. The outdoor space is really special.
Very accommodating. Thank you very much 😊

This house was adorable! The kitchen and living spaces are done so well. It’s very livable and great for visiting with family and friends. There is a Roku Tv in the living room so you don’t necessarily have to log in and remember to log out of any of your streaming services. Kitchen was well-equipped and the outdoor space is excellent!
We loved the see-through gas fireplace but had no idea how to use it and there were no instructions.
The lighting in the bathroom is bad. There are Edison bulbs over the sink and no overhead light. For my elderly father, he said the shower was so dark he could hardly see. It’s impossible to put your make up on in either bathroom because the lighting is so poor.
The beds are adequate. The bunk bed is not made for an adult, obviously, so the mattress isn’t the best. But is fine for a few nights.
I would absolutely stay here again because the kitchen, living areas, and outdoor space.
Very clean and looked exactly like the pictures. Private fully fenced in backyard.
Supper responsive, and easy to work with

Very nice place, very clean and super cute house (as my wife described it) everything was there that you would want in a fully furnished house, we enjoyed the back porch which gave lots of privacy.
will definitely stay here again
Nice place to stay. I really enjoyed the outside space and they did a great job to create a private feeling setting. Space had all the amenities a person would need. Would happily stay here again.
Beautiful home!
This place was a great place to stay for a quick getaway not far from home. It clean and our host was more than responsive and accommodating.

We really enjoyed our stay. The location was nice and easy to get to and so peaceful. The house is cozy and the hot tub and yard are awesome. We would definitely stay again but we do wish it had been cleaner. There wasn't anything hugely disturbing it was just obvious the home hadn't been thoroughly cleaned. Other than that we highly recommend this stay!
We really enjoyed our stay at Mariyem's place. It was tastefully decorated and met all of our needs. Mariyem was very helpful.
Such an awesome person and very understanding. I would definitely stay in her locations again
The house was super cute and the back yard was the best part! Perfect for pups.
I used the place for my bachelor's for my wedding and it was absolutely perfect! The place was very clean and relaxing. I highly recommend.

We had a wonderful stay. This is such a beautiful home.
We mistakenly thought there were two bunk beds but there is only one. A misunderstanding on our part. We appreciated the air mattress to help sort that confusion out. We had zero issues.
The outdoor patio area was my favorite feature of the home. Such a relaxing atmosphere. We would most-definitely stay again, and recommend this lovely home to anyone.
The house was clean and was easy to maintain. we enjoyed the stay.
Our stay was wonderful, we work a lot and it’s nice to have a home away from home. Thank you so much!

We had a great stay at this property! Clean and cozy. It’s very well decorated and furnished. The back deck setup is wonderful. It’s centrally located and minutes away from several restaurants and shopping centers. I travel to this area frequently and would definitely book here again.

I had an absolutely amazing stay at Mariyem's charming Airbnb in Fort Smith! The cozy and well-furnished space instantly felt like a home away from home. One of the highlights of my stay was definitely the hot tub, it was brand new and was perfectly operational and clean.
The convenience of being near the airport was a major plus. It made my travel arrangements smooth and stress-free. Despite the proximity to the airport, the area was surprisingly quiet and peaceful.
Mariyem's thoughtfulness truly stood out, as soon as I needed assistance she sent someone to help us out within 30 mins!
It's evident that she takes pride in ensuring her guests have an exceptional stay, and I couldn't have asked for a better experience.

We enjoyed our stay in the cozy blonde bungalow. Everything inside and out was neat and tidy. The best part was because of it being dog friendly. Our dogs had a great time running around the fenced backyard, chasing bunnies and rolling in the clover. The location was perfect. The off street parking was nice to have for unloading. It has all the charm of a historic bungalow while being well appointed with all modern conveniences. We enjoyed our stay, recommend 10/10

The Blonde Bungalow exceeded our expectations, it was updated and spotless. We especially enjoyed the kitchen and the staging was great. Jean is very communicative and even went out of her way to get a hair dryer for us which was much appreciated. We will rent again because it was so comfortable and had plenty of room for us to invite family over for dinner

I’m so glad we found this place to stay! It was cozy and there was plenty of room for the two of us and our two dogs. The house has been restored beautifully! Lots of little touches that made it feel like home. The neighborhood was quiet and we felt safe. The bed was comfortable.
the stay was absoloutley beautiful . rented the place so the inlaws cam meet their grandbaby and the house was just stunning .
The bungalow was just as described. We had a lovely stay. Loved the back yard for our pup. If we travel that way again would love to stay again!
Cutest bungalow in the sweetest neighborhood. Everything you could want is right there. The kitchen is beautiful and makes me want to redo my own kitchen! Best stay and price in town!

Cute little 2 bed-1 bath. It was clean and did remind you of your grandmothers home in the decor. Centrally located....nice remodeled kitchen and it was pet friendly which was the deal closer. It worked out beautifully....close to alot of things

First time to the area to visit family, we found getting to the house easy and pleased it was all it described and more. We felt very much at home and the space was excellent for our purposea and stay. We will definitely look to stay here, if available, next time in the area!
Great host, very responsive

this was a beautiful place to stay in!! it made you feel right at home! i love the high ceilings, spacious backyard and most importantly how STUNNING this kitchen was!!! 10/10 would recommend to anyone to stay here! will be back!

Enjoyed our stay, and Jean was great! One of the best AirBnB experiences we’ve had. Would look forward to staying with her again and highly recommend if you are looking for a nice place to stay in Ft Smith!

Super easy check in, super cute home. Jean and William have the house decorated cute for Valentine’s Day. Very clean home with tons of extra stuff in case you forget something. They have it all. It’s the coziest home I’ve rented and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Very comfy beds. Loved the little reading nook. Would stay again if we return to Fort Smith.

Our second stay here allowed us to feel even more at home. The house is near perfection and the hosts prove themselves to be wonderful people. We can only hope this home will be available if we need to stay in Ft Smith again.
loved this house. very clean and private. nice fenced in backyard. comfortable king bed. easy to find. nice kitchen. would stay here again

Very cute home and it was ready for Christmas complete with tree and stockings.
Beds were warm and comfy and if you get cold there are plenty of extra warm blankets and throws.
Enjoy looking outside or opening up windows the shades are top down bottom up for privacy.
Nice eat in dining room and gorgeous kitchen.
Only thing needed would be more kitchen pots and pans.
The backyard is amazing!

This is the most family friendly stay I’ve ever experienced. The hosts made sure we had everything we needed for our toddler. He had a blast. Our dogs had plenty of space, and were comfortable as well. Very clean, and accommodating.

The home is charming, very well decorated and set up perfectly to make it really feel like home. Just like the home, communications with Jean were comfortable and pleasant. We are already looking for a reason to return and try for another stay....Thank You!

Comfortable and clean home. Jean was very responsive and thoughtful. She knew we had toddlers and left a high chair and some toys/books for the little ones. The home was very clean, floors did not leave stains on our white socks, and it felt like home. There was plenty of space for my family. We would definitely come back again.
Great house, very accommodating for me and my dogs. Love the dog door and the fenced in yard. It was the perfect place to stay.
We enjoyed our long weekend staying at the Blonde Bungalow while in town visiting family. Very cozy and just the right size for our family.
vary nice place and clean. felt like at home and would definitely come back

Jean really went above and beyond to really make us feel at home. Even when we received an Amazon package, they went to the house and put the package in the home!!!! I really appreciate what they did!!!! If we ever travel again in that area, we will definitely stay there again!!!!

Erica was extremely helpful and responsive during our stay. The place was absolutely gorgeous and was perfect for a a group to attend a wedding. The area felt very safe and very cute area to walk around!
Beautiful house. Very clean and organized.

Erica's place is the ideal Air BnB. Very Magnolia Farms. There are four perfectly appointed bedrooms each with their own en suite. Such luxury. After a long day of roadtripping, we had plans to go out and look for a cute local restaurant. Instead, we were within staggering distance to Las Americas (?) restaurant where we drowned our traffic stress in chips and delicious margaritas then staggered back to our luxury bedrooms and passed out. I slept HARD in total silence. In the morning I had to take pictures of the pillow brand because I need them for my house. Grandma took pictures of the cushy towels. The next two nights we're in different hotels on our road trip, and I wish so badly we were still at The Porches.

This beautiful, four bedroom four bathroom house is located in the most beautiful part of Fort Smith, near the medical school. The setting is beautiful. The house is so lovely and I love the porch with swing. Everyone enjoyed the stay, it was a perfect place to be for my daughter’s Graduation.
It was a beautiful place to stay. Beds were comfy and we all had plenty of room.
Great place to stay! Highly recommend
Awesome location and beautiful place. Will stay again.
One of the best Airbnbs I’ve stayed in. Excellent value. I’ve already booked my next stay with them.
Always like staying at her places. Responsive and very comfy
Very clean, well stocked, beautiful little location. Had everything we needed for our one-night stay.
